metadata.description: Spells that transform animals and animal-related materials

spells.name: Beast of Outlandish Size
spells.description: Increases an animal's size by 50%, making it larger, stronger, and more intimidating. The animal gains +3 to Strength and +2 to damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (change animal size), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +1 for significant change

spells.name: Steed of Vengeance
spells.description: Transforms a horse into a fierce warhorse with enhanced speed, endurance, and aggression. The horse becomes fearless in battle and strikes with iron-hard hooves.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (major animal transformation), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for combat enhancement

spells.name: Shape of the Woodland Prowler
spells.description: Transforms a person into a wolf, retaining human intelligence but gaining enhanced senses, speed, and natural weapons. Clothing merges with the new form.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform human to animal), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Doublet of Impenetrable Silk
spells.description: Transforms silk, wool, or leather clothing into armor-like protection. The material becomes as strong as chainmail while remaining flexible and comfortable.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (transform animal products), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for significant improvement

spells.name: Curse of Circe
spells.description: Transforms a person into a pig, sheep, or other domesticated animal. They retain some human memories but gain animal instincts and lose speech.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform human to animal), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite, +2 for degrading transformation

spells.name: Wings of Soaring Wind
spells.description: Gives a land animal functional wings, allowing it to fly at moderate speed. The wings appear naturally integrated with the animal's body.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (add major capability), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +2 for flight ability

spells.name: Cloak of Black Feathers
spells.description: Transforms the caster into a large raven or crow, gaining the ability to fly and communicate with other corvids while retaining human intelligence.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform human to animal), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Blessing of the Pack Leader
spells.description: Enhances a group of animals with pack coordination, increased intelligence, and unified purpose. They work together with supernatural efficiency.

spells.name: Hunter's Keen Edge
spells.description: Sharpens an animal's natural weapons and enhances its hunting instincts. Claws and teeth become razor-sharp, and the animal gains +6 to hunting and tracking.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance natural weapons), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for instinct enhancement

spells.name: Form of the Fearsome Beast
spells.description: Transforms the caster into a powerful predator like a bear, lion, or dire wolf. Gains enhanced physical abilities, natural weapons, and intimidating presence.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (major human transformation), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite, +2 for powerful form
